snippet: Ms. Whelan was an epidemiologist who started a national organization to question conventional wisdom on food, chemicals and the environment.
abstract: Elizabeth Whelan, epidemiologist who started a national organization to question conventional wisdom on food, chemicals and the environment, dies at age 70.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Whelan was an epidemiologist who started a national organization to question conventional wisdom on food, chemicals and the environment.

headline.main: Elizabeth Whelan, Who Challenged Food Laws, Dies at 70
headline.print_headline: Elizabeth Whelan Dies at 70; Challenged Food Laws
